Package model

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
model.Inventory
public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
This is the Inventory class which has dependency for the Product and Part classes

  • Method Details

    • addPart

      public static void addPart​(Part newPart)
      This is the addPart method. This is called when a part is added to the allParts ObservableList.
      Parameters:
      newPart - The part to be added to the ObservableList allParts.

    • addProduct

      public static void addProduct​(Product newProduct)
      This is the addProduct method. This is called when a product is added to the allProduct ObservableList.
      Parameters:
      newProduct - The product to be added to the ObservableList allProducts.

    • lookupPart

      public static Part lookupPart​(int partId)
      This is the lookupPart method. This will return a part when looking for specific id. This will only return exact id matches. For future, make this return partial id matches.
      Parameters:
      partId - This is the part id being searched.

    • lookupProduct

      public static Product lookupProduct​(int productId)
      This is the lookupProduct method. This will return a product when looking for specific id. This will only return exact id matches. For future, make this return partial id matches.
      Parameters:
      productId - The product id being searched.

    • lookupPart

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> lookupPart​(java.lang.String partName)
      This is the lookupPart method. This will return any part that contains the searched string. This is specific to capitalized or not capitalized letters/phrases. For future, make it non-case sensitive.
      Parameters:
      partName - The part name or partial name string being searched.

    • lookupProduct

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> lookupProduct​(java.lang.String productName)
      This is the lookupProduct method. This will return any product that contains the searched string. This is specific to capitalized or not capitalized letters/phrases. For future, make it non-case sensitive.
      Parameters:
      productName - The product name or partial name string being searched.

    • updatePart

      public static void updatePart​(int index, Part selectedPart)
      This is the updatePart method. This will modify the selected part by replacing the previous values with new values.
      Parameters:
      index - The position of the part from 0 to end of list in the ObservableList allParts.
      selectedPart - The selected part to be updated.

    • updateProduct

      public static void updateProduct​(int index, Product newProduct)
      This is the updateProduct method. This will modify the selected product by replacing the previous values with new values.
      Parameters:
      index - The position of the product from 0 to end of list in the ObservableList allProducts.
      newProduct - The selected product to be updated.

    • deletePart

      public static boolean deletePart​(Part selectedPart)
      This is the deletePart method. This will remove the selectedPart from the observableList allParts.
      Parameters:
      selectedPart - This is the part to be removed from the ObservableList allParts.

    • deleteProduct

      public static boolean deleteProduct​(Product selectedProduct)
      This is the deleteProduct Method. This will remove the selectedProduct from the observableList allProducts.
      Parameters:
      selectedProduct - This is the product to be removed from the ObservableList allProducts.

    • getAllParts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> getAllParts()
      This is the getAllParts method. This method will return the ObservableList allParts.
      Returns:
      Returns the list of parts from the ObservableList allParts.

    • getAllProducts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> getAllProducts()
      This is the getAllProducts method. This method will return the ObservableList allProducts.
      Returns:
      Returns the list of products in the ObservableList allProducts.
